website_summaries.verdict: Awash with Awapuhi extract from Hawaii, this shampoo stops hair from losing moisture.
pros: Quenches the thirst of dry hair
It is a good shampoo to boost volume
cons: You can see excess residue on hair if you use too much

customer_reviews.title: Real thing
customer_reviews.text: Had a salon bought version at home, and this one seemed no different. I am pro trained in Paul Mitchell as well (have my cosmetology schooling from them), and really didn’t have high hopes for this being legit, but it’s the real deal! It’s not any cheaper on here though, so if you can get it from your cosmetologist, do it. I was in a bit of a pinch, and thought I’d give this a try. The original awapuhi is a great classic product in PM, and is a very basic, somewhat gentle sulfate shampoo. This is NOT the black awapuhi sulfate free Paul Mitchell shampoo!! It’s their classic awapuhi shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: RedHal

customer_reviews.title: Possibly FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I don't know for sure but this shampoo looks different from the one I bought from CVS pharmacy. It does come in a larger bottle so IDK. What bothers me the most is the fact that my scalp started getting huge amounts of build up the next day after washing with this, my hair looks dry and my scalp itches, so my assumption is this is a FAKE product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee
customer_reviews.text: I have very, very fine hair, like glass. But I have a TON of it. This shampoo is light enough not to weigh my hair down, makes it silky smooth, gives me a little volume, and gives me decent second-day hair while smelling subtle and lovely.
customer_reviews.author: LadyNavy

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo and amazing smell!
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this is amazing! I've wanted to try this shampoo for a few years now but could never find it at a decent price. When I first washed my hair with it, it felt weird because of how it cleans all of the old product off of your hair. After your hair is dried, that feeling goes away and It doesn't leave your hair dry or tangly. As a woman of color with natural hair, it is hard to find a shampoo that works well for me without destroying my hair or scalp in the process but this one works perfectly! I wish I tried it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: RiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Watered down, fragrance not quite as pronounced
customer_reviews.text: Paul Mitchell has always put out great hair care products. And usually I only ever get to enjoy them in salons and the occasional travel size offerings in nicer hotels and such. I love the Awapuhi shampoo for its rich texture, its fresh fragrance and the wonderful way it cleans my hair...so clean it squeaks. This item through Amazon feels like an imposter. Its runny, and the scent isn't fresh and invigorating. I will not purchase it again through this seller, but opt for some place local so I can be certain of what I'm getting. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Graphic Goddess

customer_reviews.title: OK, but really watery
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this shampoo many years ago and have tried it a couple of times in the last decade, so I ordered this big bottle. What I don't remember is the shampoo being so thin and watery. This is a problem when you have a big bottle and it pours right out, wasting a lot. It also pulls color like crazy, so probably not ideal for those of us with party colored hair. The smell is meh, but at least it isn't strong, so that's a pro in my book. I don't think this works any better than anything you buy in the drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Created tangles and knots!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really upset about purchasing this shampoo. I decided to purchase this because the caption says it helps create moisture. Even though the shampoo was a little pricey compared to pharmacy shampoos, I bought this product because I wanted to try something new and thought it would moisturize my hair. It did the exact opposite for my hair. Every time I use this product, it tangled my hair from the tip to the root. It creates a lot of tangles and knots and even a lot of conditioner didn’t help. I’m really upset about buying this product and I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy Here, Go to a Salon
customer_reviews.text: Not Authentic, bought this during pandemic. And although it smelt similar to what i buy at a salon. This is Not a True Paul Mitchell product. The color is creamy white. The original is clear. The lather is stripping leaving hair very dry. I dont know what they did to this, but Do Not Buy This .
customer_reviews.author: Santita Colon

customer_reviews.title: Hated the smell
customer_reviews.text: For decades (ahem) I have loved Paul Mitchell Awapuhi Shampoo. The scent was heavenly. I was not a frequent buyer, maybe once every few years. So I found a deal for this on Amazon. It came damaged. Shampoo all leaked in the bag it was in. They should have also taped the cover. After cleaning it all off, I tried it, the smell is horrible now. How can it go from my favorite scent to something so horrible? Either they changed the formula or it's not official? I don't know. Things always change. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: aweful
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm one of the ones that got a dud-after reading reviews of all the happy customers I bought this. It smells aweful and when I used it, it felt like my hair was straw plus the smell. I do use a lot of other name brand products from Amazon and am super happy with others-wish I could name but I don't think I can. Just one bummer in the bunch. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo. Try it, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: Buying the largest size X 2 is a great bargain. I've used a vast amount of different brands. This is very best I've found for my dry fly away hair and itchy scalp to date. I occasionally use a Paul Mitchell leave on spray conditioner about twice a month. It has a gentle fragrance, although not enough scent to bother my extremely sensitive allergies!! A small amount, dime size, cleans my short hair squeaky clean. And NO MORE ITCH!!! (Probably from my medications.) I highly recommend this shampoo. Great for beautiful, body and bright shiney manageable hair of any color. 🕊️🇺🇸😌
customer_reviews.author: Pray

customer_reviews.title: NOT Awapuhi
customer_reviews.text: Bottle looked the same as Awapuhi, product Looked similar to Awapuhi, but it had a metallic smell. Used once and was sure; This is Not Awapuhi!!! Perhaps some foul smelling substance mixed with half a bottle of Awapuhi at best. BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: myestro

customer_reviews.title: My hair feels like straw now.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any problems with receiving my order, but I really don't love this shampoo. It was expensive so I thought it would be better quality, but it's really drying and it smells weird. It smells sort of natural but stinky, like overripe fruit or gone-off ginger. I sort of like that it really does remove all residue from hair, but it takes too much, it leaves the hair brittle. My hair gets so tangled near the roots after putting my hair up in a ponytail now. The consistency of the shampoo is also weird, sort of like hair gel.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingomotel

customer_reviews.title: Paul Michelle has great products!
customer_reviews.text: At one point I bought every shampoo on the market till I came across Paul Mitchell and that was it .. search over no need to look further. My hair is lively every single time, other products my hair would come out flat after I was about half way through the bottle. This shampoo washes out clean and complete not leaving anything noticeable behind. The only thing is, that I don't know if I like this original better than the 'original one' (which smells better than this). The smell doesn't stay either way (which is a good thing in my opinion), so not sure that matters too much. Good luck out there.
customer_reviews.author: Daxx

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I bought because I was tempted by all positive reviews and wanted to give it a try. Unfortunately I am very dissatisfied as the shampoo doesn't do anything good! In the shower it transform my hair into one huge tangle. My hair feels extremely dry. Additional it doesn't clean the scalp. After one day my hair are greasy and doesn't smell good. Waste of money now I have to buy another shampoo...
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: When I received the product the bottle didn’t look authentic ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product the bottle didn’t look authentic. After using the shampoo, I’m experiencing numerous dry, scaly bumps all over my scalp. This is the reason I use Paul Mitchell products so I don’t have these issues. From now on I will only purchase Paul Mitchell products from a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the original product.
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this product on Amazon— typically I buy this same product from the salon. This was not the same great shampoo I am used to. Should’ve known better. Horrible scent and not the same consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McPherson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. My hair is cleaner, stronger, thicker, healthier
customer_reviews.text: The smell isn’t good, but it’s not bad either and it’s not very strong anyway. I have bought this shampoo from a salon before because the stylist suggested it for my hair type (oily, easily damaged and occasional dandruff) and even though it was pricey I’m glad I listened. I’m happy to have found it here for a much better price and the bottle I received is definitely authentic, exactly the same as what I purchased at the salon
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: MIGHT be good, if you're lucky...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to check it's suppliers. I've ordered over 6 bottles over the course of the years, and about 1/3 is the proper, thick, rich lather product you should expect. The rest is watered down by almost half. The last bottle I got is the genuine thing: heavy and thick that pours slowly from the bottle, super rich lather, subtle soft scent, and gently and thoroughly cleans your hair. I've never gone back to any other brand after trying awapuhi. But you may have to get it somewhere else if you want the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: No scent?
customer_reviews.text: I was staying at a hotel that featured PM Awapuhi shampoo, and I just loved it, both for rich, luxurious wash and the yummy scent. I bought this big one as soon as I got home (I really loved that hotel shampoo) and the nice wash is still there, but it doesn't smell like anything at all. That was a major disappointment. I see other people commenting on the lovely scent so I'm wondering if I just got a weird bottle or what. My hair looks and feels great, but there is no smell whatsoever with this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: The day Paul Mitchell did my hair....
customer_reviews.text: and said This Shampoo is what your hair needs. I never once looked back! This Awapuhi Shampoo is so awesome, it's amazing that a dime-size (if hair is short) to quarter-size (if hair is long) amount can do for your hair! I have extremely Oily Hair and this controls it all; the remainder of my family and extended family all have dry to extremely dry hair - works great as well. Makes your hair shiny, smooth, and silky! NEVERMORE will I travel to and fro trying to find a shampoo that works!
customer_reviews.author: Steppin' Time

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair feel dirty
customer_reviews.text: I have never used Paul Mitchell so I can't say if this is truly an authentic product. 8 bought this because I wanted an upgrade shampoo and conditioner. This made my hair feel dirtier than before. My hair looked greasy after blow drying and even worse if I used a flat iron. Waste of $20. I gave this product over 2 weeks before I decided it was the shampoo and conditioner making my hair feel so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: This is FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo had no aluminum seal in the bottle. It smells and lathers nothing like the real shampoo. This shampoo is a complete fake, cannot even say watered down because it does not resemble anything of the original shampoo. I am returning it. Don't waste your money order from a professional company. Might be 99 cent Suave in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Justmealicia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love PM Awapuhi shampoo. But the two bottles of it that were delivered to me do not have that wonderful smell. I suspect they were taken from old stock or some cheap shampoo was mixed in. 😡
customer_reviews.author: BookNotesLaurie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for scalp & hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is my favorite ever! It smells good and feels great during application. I will use this as my number 1 choice for shampoo my family’s hair. It even got rid of my oily dandruff problem I’ve had forever. I tried Head and Shoulders, prescription. I’ve tried it all and nothing ever took care of my scalp like this has. I bought it as a lice preventative when my boys came home from school with lice and I can’t oive without it now.
customer_reviews.author: Kass B.

customer_reviews.title: My hair has NEVER looked better
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo was recommended to me by my stylist, so you can be sure I was ready for a spooky price tag. However, it’s so affordable and I am not kidding when I say that my hair has NEVER looked better. I have always struggled with my hair being either oily or frizzy with no in-between, but this shampoo leaves no residue, allowing me to wash my hair each day to get that clean, sleek, healthy look. I don’t see a day where I switch away from this shampoo. And to think before I was using tea tree, which can be 3x as expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell for life ... Or at least the part 20 years.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shampoo that doesn't leave a filmy buildup like so many shampoos do after long-term use. It may seem pricey, but the Amazon price is cheaper than you would get in a salon or even in the Walmart hair place. Also, so little is required, user for use, it's very competitive with in-store brands.
customer_reviews.author: Never At A Loss For Words

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo I’ve found in tears! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin fine hair that is oily on top with dry ends. I am getting older, 44, and my hair is thinning quickly. It is so hard to find a shampoo that moisturizes my ends without making my hair look oily on top. I only used this shampoo because it was in a hotel room I stayed in & I loved it! (So did my husband, btw). My hair was clean & volumized, not dry or oily. It’s been a while since I’ve been able to find a shampoo that makes me happy. I did not think the price would be this affordable for such a great hair product!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthiatxrn

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The scent is difficult to describe, but I find it nice and subtle. This cleans and lathers very well, so you only need to use a little! I use it only a few times a week with an extra moisturizing conditioner because it is a little drying.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love the shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this one. It is totally genuine and feels like a salon shampoo. My only concern was the packaging. It came leaking in the plastic it was packed in. I wish they could come up with a seal inside the cap to enable better shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Charu

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo (IMO)
customer_reviews.text: I used to get this at the hair salon when I was younger & was happy to find it online. It has a very unique scent that brings back memories & I love it. I also found it at Ulta but I try to only buy it when it's on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Melody w.

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottle
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment on the product itself yet because It was just delivered today. But when I opened it it was leaking so badly that it got shampoo all over my counter. I will update review if the product itself is better than how it was delivered
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Container leaked half the product
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and that is why I use it. However, the container leaked half it's contents and was unusable. Things is what I rated the value so low. I paid full price for half the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic H Angelina Jr

customer_reviews.title: Hmm. Legit or fake?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know. Just not sure this is legit. Makes my hair very dry and I have broken out with painful bumps on my scalp and have itching. Have used Paul Mitchell many times before. Just placed my order directly with Paul Mitchell today.
customer_reviews.author: TQMiami

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Its for men and women alike. Very nice natural neutral scent. Leaves your hair super soft and feeling great. You don't need much. A little goes a long way. Work it into your hair and let it absorb for a minute or so before rinsing. You will instantly notice how soft and clean your hair feels. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert York

customer_reviews.title: A great shampoo at an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Paul Mitchell Awupuhi shampoo for years. It's a wonderful product and much less expensive from Amazon or a barber shop / hairdresser shop. The product throughly cleans your hair and does not damage it at all. If you want nice looking, smooth hair then purchase this product at Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A small amount goes a long way. Leave hair clean and soft. Rinses our easy. The smell is not very strong, it doesn’t smell like flowers or anything like that. I’d say it has a smell that is gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily hair
customer_reviews.text: Smells odd out of the bottle, but once you shampoo your hair it smells like nothing. This shampoo is amazing; I wash my (oily) hair once every 4 days or so instead of every other day, and my hair stays much cleaner without any harsh stripping effects. I also use much less shampoo (about 1.5 teaspoons worth) than I used to (about 2 tablespoons worth) and I get the same coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Gréat shampoo! Bought it for my daughter who is a nurse and also had a baby recently. She only uses this shampoo and wanted to treat her since she is so busy. Shé has great hair!
customer_reviews.author: LeaC

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Memories
customer_reviews.text: Something reminded me of this shampoo,which we used to buy in a salon back in the '80s!! I had no idea if I'd find it again... I got a bottle for my sister as well & she sh*t when she saw it!! This stuff is GREAT as well as about one of the best scents on earth :)
customer_reviews.author: manicannie

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This was not the real product. The color was wrong, it smells awful, and it leaves my hair feeling coarse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my precious
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I can't find awapuhi shampoo in the stores anymore, just the stupid moisturizing one which smells terrible and makes my hair oily. This one dries my hair out a little more, which would be a bad thing but I prefer it, as I only wash every other day or every 2 days. Having it dry your hair a bit leaves it nice for the second day, and I follow it with a dab of the original conditioner by PM as well. My tried and true shampoo. Come back to stores please :(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My color is lasting longer and hair feels so clean
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. This leaves my hair feeling clean, moist and shiny. My hair does not feel heavy or weighted down. It doesn’t strip my hair and my color is lasting longer. I’ve tried many shampoos that are supposed to help the color last longer and for some reason this shampoo does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Steddy

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why my experience is so opposite from others. it seems to strip my hair of oil. almost drying it out. i though it was one of the best but i am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bo E

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine
customer_reviews.text: Not a genuine product. I bought this to replace one I bought in a drug store and this had a completely weird smell, like it was cut with something else. It also made my eyes burn. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Graci

customer_reviews.title: Light natural scent and clean hair
customer_reviews.text: Scent is pleasant and not overwhelming. I like that the product is not tested on animals. I sometimes change shampoos when my hair starts to feel as if there is too much conditioning. My hair is colored and I do not use conditioners. Overall, an excellent product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Works great as daily go-to
customer_reviews.text: Gives good body, and can be used daily without any itching or etc. Will buy again, lasts a long time, only small amount (no kidding) can really lather up well as it works through your hair, and you don't lose any to the floor in applying, so very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jr Lang

customer_reviews.title: Smells SO GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I trust the paul mitche brand, this shampoo had been around for a while and still is so awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Stef Von E

customer_reviews.title: Using it for 5 years and it is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it for 5 years already and never had any problems. I have sensitive skin and it becomes irritated and starts itching if I use shampoo for adults for couple times. I tried this shampoo when found in a room in Marriott hotel and using it on daily basis from then.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for many years. Definitely authentic, and I scored a bottle on sale! Yay!!! The seller packages wisely also. Liquids frequently leak (minimally, but still could be messy..), as mine did a little, but the packaging kept the mess contained and very easy to clean up. Maybe one shampoo worth of loss, so no biggie. =)
customer_reviews.author: GlennH

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: my hair dresser uses this on me when I go to her which is why I bought it. I was not impressed with it though. it worked amazingly on my teenage sons hair but not so much on mine. made it feel dry even followed with conditioner. I feel like it's made my dye fade quicker also. idk, could be me. I wont purchase for myself again.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlee Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Smells yummy, unfortunately made my scalp itchy and dry
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally obsessed with Hawaii so I was really looking forward to basking in the scent and awapuhi. It smells very nice--tropical yet kind of like watermelon gum. And it lathered great. Unfortunately it contains sulfates (SLS I think) and my scalp has turned into a flaky itchy wasteland after using it every other day for the past month. Gonna swap this out as soon as I find a suitable replacement.
customer_reviews.author: WiskoMommy

customer_reviews.title: Removes build up
customer_reviews.text: I really like this in the summer to help strip some of the oils and build up out of my hair without drying it out. I do feel like I need to use a little bit of conditioner after I use this for my personal preference, but because it is a conditioning shampoo you definitely don’t have to.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Hair is always different, there is a reason this has been around for awhile,
customer_reviews.text: All ways my favourite, it is great on my very fine hair, have used it for years, all the products are good, use the blow dry product too, I almost forgot, I always use PeterThomasRoth mega-rich Nourishing Conditioner, and use a little of Awapuhi Finishing spray, and a touch of Awapuhi Sea-spray for a little texture prior to drying, use the finishing spray in moderation. I am english and have very fine hair and I wear it long, and this works for me, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: dina

customer_reviews.title: Did they change the formula???
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was leaking in bag. Also, the scent is nothing like I remember. I used PM Awapuhi for years when I was younger. I bought it again just to experience the scent. It smells like cheap soap. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Your hired drivers constantly tear up our yard
customer_reviews.text: The drivers you hire to deliver packages constantly tear up our yard and they do so with wreckless abandon. You need to find a way to train them or communicate with them the importance of respecting the property of the homeowners on whose property they drive to deliver packages. This should be part of Amazon's service. We have horrible deep ruts all through our yard from your hired drivers just driving through our grass and not staying on the driveway. I would ban them from our driveway if I could. It is very costly to constantly repair ruts and plant new grass and sometimes they break sprinkler heads.
customer_reviews.author: douglas nabhan

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 20 years. Purchased at the barber shop that I also spent a good many years. Times change, my Mrs. cuts my hair and yes I pay her. Order the shampoo from Amazon. A bottle last 6 months. A drop is plenty.
customer_reviews.author: PC Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. I have used it before and I also use the Wild Ginger Keratin Treatment & Triplex (Wild Ginger) Treatment on my hair and it's all amazing. I sometimes like to try other products, like Jen Aniston's "Living Proof", but I always seem to go back to Paul Mitchell. Been using his products for almost 20 years now and I absolutely love love love it.
customer_reviews.author: MsPittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Authentic or Not??
customer_reviews.text: I am not convinced this is authentic PM Awapuhi shampoo. It lathers well, but there is no fragrance & it seems to dry out my hair. The original Awapuhi leaves my hair shiny & soft- and had a light, delicious scent. Won't return as it is too much trouble to box & ship one product. Next time, I will purchase retail.
customer_reviews.author: Still Dreamin’

customer_reviews.title: Good product with a nice coconut scent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Awapuhi shampoo daily for decades. It's a really great product. Not necessarily cheap, but you get what you pay for. This shampoo is a really good one for every day use. Not harsh at all, but still cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I have used Paul Mitchell for years. This is NOT PAUL MITCHELL. And IT STINKS. And IT LEAKED out of both bottles, out of the plastic they were wrapped in, out of the cardboard box, and onto my upholstery. A MESS A SCAM A BIG STRIKE AGAINST AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Not just for hair!
customer_reviews.text: Few people know that Awapuhi Shampoo is also a body wash for everyone. We have used this for years. Buy the largest size, add a pump and eliminate the extra bottle in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Pam L.

customer_reviews.title: This item is not original.
customer_reviews.text: Item is not original. What little scent there is it smells terrible and leaves hair feeling dry. I have purchased this product many times through a salon so I know this is NOT how it is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sorry but this shampoo did NOT work for me. The smell was AWFUL. I couldn’t get past it enough to use it more than one time due to the terrible smell, so I can’t vouch for the quality other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo w/ “The Detangler”
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect shampoo to pair up with “the detangler” conditioner, also by Paul Mitchell. My hair is thin, not oily, and too short to get tangled, but these two products are still the best I found; highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Braino!

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Very good shampoo. Started buying this after using it at many of the Marriott hotels I stay at when traveling. They use it as their house shampoo. Not sure why the cap is not sealed...mine arrived and some product had leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not my favorite smell
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this yesterday and used it for the first time this morning. Overall, I think the shampoo is a great product. My hair feels clean and gives me that “squeaky” sound when I’ve washed it all out. The only thing I don’t love is the smell. I was expecting a tropical flower or fruit type smell but it really smells more like cucumber. Not bad, just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Moseley

customer_reviews.title: this is great shampoo for treated hair
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser introduced Paul Mitchell Awapuhi to me, because I have color-treated hair. I can use it daily, and my hair seems "happy". Also, the scent is mild and very pleasant in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Becky O

customer_reviews.title: Good not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Good but nothing special versus other cheaper options. It smells very good but honestly works like most other drugstore shampoos. Its not bad at all but not amazing either.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality shampoo
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried this shampoo in August 2018. Since then I personally use only this brand. I tried couple others for a short time - this one is way better on many counts. Cleans well, moisturizes enough, doesn't have strong smell (which is important for me) and you don't need to use big amount to wash your head. Overall, I'm glad that I found it on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Nurlan Smailov

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Pricier than I’m used to spending on shampoo but worth it. I flat iron my hair and I have to wash every day. This stuff smells good and leaves my hair feeling great. When I have to stay somewhere and I can’t use this for a day or two I can easily tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Has always been my husbands favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shampoo. He has been using it for years and plans to for many to come....Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Thus product works great for those who struggle with hard water or have well water than can make your hair smell funny. It deep cleans and preps hair for the conditioner
customer_reviews.author: horsey

customer_reviews.title: Product Good; Arrived with Cap Open
customer_reviews.text: While I like this product, when it arrived, the flip cap was open and shampoo was not only captured in the bag it was shipped in but had leaked throughout the packaging. Probably lost 10% of the product. Not happy as shampoo is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this size to try out product. Love it! Adds moisture without being gummy on my scalp. My hair performs better for styling. Will be buying full size product. Love Paul Mitchell
customer_reviews.author: Pood Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The original
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the negative reviews, this is the exact product I used years ago. That light wonderful fragrance is hard to forget. I will never switch again. It lathers well and doesn’t dry my colored hair.
customer_reviews.author: LMD

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is great for someone with thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is great for someone with thin hair. I love the way it smells. I just wish it wasn't as soapy. It kind of feels like I am rinsing with bubble bath water.
customer_reviews.author: R. RobertsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Greatest shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over ten years. It is the best shampoo I ha e found. It is very economical, even though the initial price might seem high. Amazon price is lower than salon prices. Has a nice scent and leaves my hair shiny and soft.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl olson

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has always been the best you can buy, I have used it for decades!
customer_reviews.author: maggi hartwell

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My hair never gets tired of this gentle shampoo ... Paul Mitchell Awapuhi. I just transfer some to a small bottle I keep in the shower and can easily travel with. Economy and luxury.
customer_reviews.author: DJF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t wanna buy a big bottle at ulta since I’ve already used this for years I needed a travel size for vacation. It is perfect & the sent is awesome. If you’ve never tried Paul Mitchell I highly suggest it!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my hair cutter. I have curly, fine, white hair. I like a shampoo that feels clean and gives me volume. This works great.
customer_reviews.author: bobbiesgirl

customer_reviews.title: it is so funny..
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say anything but "Paul Mitchell" the name speaks quality all by itself.....Thanks for making an outstanding product for my natural curly hair. Plus my Chorkie loves it too...Everytime I wash my hair he has to run his little nose through it, it is so funny.... Thanks again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Make my hair feel good!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this shampoo! It makes my hair softer, which makes it look a little shinier. I also like the way it makes my scalp feel--not dry, but refreshed feeling. Sounds like advertising hype, because I'm not describing it very well. But it's good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: L Cranston

customer_reviews.title: Not ok. Sad.
customer_reviews.text: This no longer the quality product Ive used in the past. Big fail. Super disappointed. Cannot re commend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Counelis

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: It makes my very coarse hair soft and sleek. (This sounds familiar, but is true!) It’s a bit pricey but worth it, so I’ve been using all these years together with The detangler. (In fact I’m not sure if it’s the shampoo or the conditioner that does this great job. I recommend the both.)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Live Up To The Hype
customer_reviews.text: I have heard wonderful things about this shampoo but unfortunately it provided no moisture to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tai

customer_reviews.title: Great cleansing shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this- it’s a light fresh scent. It’s not moisturizing but more of a cleansing shampoo. I like using it as a body wash too.
customer_reviews.author: farmgirl007

customer_reviews.title: arrived quickly in good form, genuine product
customer_reviews.text: I had a little left of the bottle I bought the salon, and it's the same product. It arrived fast and intact. This shampoo does not weigh down or dry out my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: Worst shampoo I have ever used my hair was left stripped, dull, and a tangled mess. I am still trying to repair the damage
customer_reviews.author: susan mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Clean hair, no residue
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and it cleans the oil, styling products and hairspray from my hair beautifully, without excess drying.
customer_reviews.author: PKG1955

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this shampoo for maybe 15 years now and the quality is superior. One needs only the smallest amount to produce a great lather and clean, nicely conditioned hair. No need to repeat.
customer_reviews.author: DavidLS

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product compared to last order!!
customer_reviews.text: Others have said this, too. This shampoo is not as thick and rich and does not smell wonderful like the last bottle I ordered. Either Paul Mitchell has changed their formula or this is not the "real thing"! I had some left in a travel bottle and there is no comparison in quality. Will try to find this product somewhere else. Returning. (And I never write reviews!)
customer_reviews.author: JoanieP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lingering scent.
customer_reviews.text: Washes out easily and cleans well. I fill my soap bottles with it bc it works so well and smells tropical coconut-y.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use half this and half horse shampoo then finish with the Paul Mitchell leave in conditioner. My hair is shiny and long and it grows fast. Not only does it smell good, it’s not drying for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get's hair clean without "drying" it out.
customer_reviews.text: Smell was pleasant and not overwhelming. It cleans really well without drying my hair out. But it doesn't really moisturize it. Still have to use a conditioner regularly.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Still The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I used this product when I was younger. I decided to give it another because I have been so disappointed in other brands and it’s amazing! The scent is exactly as I remember. My hair is so much softer and fuller! Thanks Paul Mitchell for not changing something that has worked for so long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Berrier Crowell

customer_reviews.title: 3rd times is a charm...seems my family loves this one :)
customer_reviews.text: Third purchase family loves this one. Classic Paul Mitchell product still a good as its always been.
customer_reviews.author: T T

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the lid was open and much of the product was inside the bag. I felt the top should have been taped also inside the bag. That’s why I gave it a 1 Star ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M. Bury

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love the light sent and suds quality which rinses out easily. I have been using this shampoo for years! Shampoo does not weigh my hair down or leave any residue.
customer_reviews.author: Jane  W

product_meta.title: Paul Mitchell Awapuhi Shampoo
product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 ozEnjoy the lush lather and moisturizing goodness of Paul Mitchell Awapuhi Shampoo. This daily shampoo thoroughly cleanses all hair types, including color-treated hair, and brightens hair by removing dulling buildup. Hawaiian awapuhi helps prevent moisture loss while special conditioners help improve hair texture and add volume. Added bonus: This versatile shampoo multi-tasks as a luxurious body wash. Hair Type: Ideal for All Hair Types. Fragrance: Refreshing cucumber melon scent with soft underlying notes of violet and water flower. Did You Know? In 1982 our co-founders established a self-sustaining, solar-powered awapuhi farm in Hawaii—all of the awapuhi used in our products is still harvested there today.

BRAND STORY
Paul Mitchell is results-driven hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.
